modName: Dude wheres my pants - Leather Armor
summary: This mod adds new leather armor with pants, its craftable and spread throughout the world in level lists.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]None of my mods may be used in ANY paid mods, if you got permission to use my mod from me you do NOT have permission to use it in a sale.[/b][/size]


This is my first .esp with the new CK, let me know if there are any issues please.

==========
Description
==========

I enjoy man skirts as much as the next person (I really do like most the armors in Skyrim), but the fact that 90% of light armor has no pants bothers me... I mean not all of us are Nords that have a great frost resistance (Such as Argonians and Khajiit) so we do not freeze are butts off.

So I made some pants for the Leather armor, I tried to keep the flavor as close to vanilla a possible.

==========
FAQ
==========

Q. Will this work with NMM?
A. It should.

Q. Where can you find the armor at?
A. You can craft them at the Tanning rack and you can find them spread through out the world in level lists.

Q. Why not the smithing area?
A. I do not like my character leveling so much on just crafting.

Q. Do the body weights work with this mod?
A. Yes they do work.

Q. Can I use this with the skirted version?
A. Yes if you use the update 1.1.

Q. I want this different about the mod, make it for me!
A. I do this in my spare time, when I have the time I will work on it more.

Q. Will this work with X body mod?
A. If that body does not edit the arm texture mapping then it will work just fine.

Q. I think your ruining lore by making pants!
A. Hey that's your opinion, its not like they have no pants in Skyrim already.

==========
Installation
==========

Extract all folders to Skyrim\data.
If you are asked to overwrite files under meshes and textures, select 'yes to all'.

To remove delete:

Studded mesh folder.

==========
History
==========

1.0 - First Release
1.1 - Made standalone version with level lists and crafting.

==========
Known Bugs & Issues:
==========

Some boots may look alittle odd, but there should be no clipping.

==========
CREDITS & PERMISSIONS
==========

Nivea: for making the meshes.

==========
Licensing/Legal
==========

This mod is NOT to be used without my permission, this includes but not limited to:

Uploading to a different site then Nexus
Recolors
Uploading to Steamworks

You do not have my permissions.

Why? Because I do not like the idea of people using my stuff with Steamworks when it comes out.

==========
Contact
==========

You can find me on many different forums, all under the same name Nivea I check all my mail often. Your best bet is Nexus though.

Official oblivion forum: http://www.bethsoft.com/absorbs/index.php?show user=66980
Nexus: http://www.newvegasnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=55918

==========
sincerely,
Nivea
